title: Bug 116829: Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description: Description: Label font size doesn't change right away when it is modified.
OB: The label height is not changing immediately after modifying the label's font size. This can be seen in the UI.
EB: The label height should be adjusted as soon as the font size is modified.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Open the UI where the label is displayed. 
2. Modify the font size of the label. 
3. Observe that the label's height does not change to accommodate the new font size.
